articles.title: UK Covid news LIVE: Montenegro becomes first European destination to go on red list - Evening Standard
articles.description: Montenegro will on Monday become the first European country to be added to the UK’s travel red list after an announcement by the Department of Transport last night.

articles.title: Shamrock Rovers left frustrated as European adventure ends - The42
articles.description: Flora Tallinn advanced at the expense of the Irish side in the Europa Conference League this evening.
articles.content:

(Flora advance 5-2 on aggregate)

articles.content:
